page.title: 08Ayton Primary School.
page.content: {Emma Frew writes:- Our school is just a new school.It opened in{September 1985}and is increasing all the time.We have people from{Japan}who have a special tutor called Mrs Scurfield.We do pottery and baking which I enjoy.We have two art areas but at present we only use one.Our headteacher is called Mrs Wilson.My teacher is Mr Atkinson. There are three other teachers, Mrs Phipps,Mrs Clark and Mrs Robinson.We have a library and when there weren't many pupils we had assembly in there. It is a nice school,everything is new.We go to the swimming baths every other week.I enjoy that too.We do Maths, English, Topics, Science(we are doing "Frogs"), and Past and Present. There is lots of choice,no one gets bored. {(N/B Nissan factory opened 1985)
